thread.section_title: Uncle Dan's Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Uncle Dan's | udans.com | 3 of 32
thread.title: HBF

author: HBF
title: HBF
text:
Paid for 2nd day shipping and got it at the end of the 3rd day. Then when I had to return most of the order, there was no shipping label included as with most online retailers, so I had to hassle with a trip to the Post Office.
Now they're refunding me the items less the first-time discount for being a new customer, which I find pretty lame.
In total, I think I wound up paying $60 for a $20 item when all said and done. Will avoid Uncle Dan's in the future.
